text:
It seems to be working for me but its very inconsistent. If the icon field is in a repeater group it sometimes work but most of the time not. I can't seem to find a pattern as to why/when it does that. 
I get this error : 
1.
Error:Syntax error in "[missing {{token}} value]"
2.
Error:Syntax error in "[missing {{token}} value]"
3.
Error:Syntax error in "[missing {{token}} value]"
